alert.note: Alert for Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 5:13PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WEST CENTRAL JEFFERSON... NORTHWESTERN TAYLOR AND SOUTHWESTERN MADISON COUNTIES THROUGH 545 PM EDT... At 513 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles south of Monticello, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Iddo, Lamont, Waukeenah, Capps, Wacissa, Wacissa Springs, Eridu, Nash, Cabbage Grove, and Thomas City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
